DataElement.preferredDefinition: The unique identifier for a pathology report.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Microscopic Findings Domain Pathology Report Finding
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to microscopic findings._A report that provides a description of the gross and microscopic examination of the specimen and is used to make a diagnosis and to determine treatment. It defines which structures and organs of the body are involved by the tumor, verifies the primary site of the cancer and describes the extent to which it has spread._Clinical, laboratory or molecular evidence, or absence of evidence of disease.
